mapper.sql: id, year, month_day, total_amount, total_num, store_id, branch_id, create_by, create_time, withdrawal_time, processing_time, settlement_time, update_by, update_time, del_flag
mapper.select: SELECT ogt.`order_id`, ogt.`goods_id`, ogt.`name`, ogt.`standard_str`, ogt.`article_number`, ogt.`number` AS goodsNumber, orrgt.`distribute_price`, orrgt.`total_amount` FROM om_report_rel_goods_temp orrgt LEFT JOIN om_goods_temp ogt ON ogt.`id` = orrgt.`goods_temp_id` and orrgt.`report_id` = #{id} ORDER BY orrgt.`create_time` DESC
